meanings.definition: Having a greater ability to make puns.
meanings.sent1: She is the punnier of the two friends, always coming up with clever wordplay.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jokes are funnier, but his friend is punnier with all the puns.
meanings.sent3: At the pun competition, she was declared the punnier contestant, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a punnier place than most, where every word had a playful twist.
meanings.sent5: In the land of humor, she reigned as the punnier queen, ruling with wit and laughter.

meanings.sent1: The punnier joke made everyone laugh harder than the first one.
meanings.sent2: Today's punnier comic strip had everyone chuckling at the clever wordplay.
meanings.sent3: His punnier sense of humor always lightened the mood, even on the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent4: The punnier side of his personality shone through when he cracked a joke at the right moment.
meanings.sent5: In the world of comedy, his punnier style set him apart from the rest, earning him a loyal following.
